aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.introduction: At Al Weam Centre, we prioritize your health and well-being. Established with a commitment to excellence, our team of dedicated professionals offers personalized care in a comfortable environment.
aboutSection.mission: Our mission is to deliver high-quality medical services that meet the diverse needs of our community.

testimonialsSection.title: What Our Patients Say
testimonialsSection.review1: The team at Al Weam Centre provided exceptional care during my treatment. Highly recommend!
testimonialsSection.review2: A welcoming environment with professional staff. My go-to clinic for all health needs.
testimonialsSection.review3: Outstanding medical care with compassionate doctors. I trust them with my family's health.
